705200.name: Blanco Original Soundtrack
705200.description:
All the music that plays in Blanco! Created by ChipBoy.

What tracks are included in this OST?


1. The Color of Adventure (1-1 Theme)
2. Casino Catastrophe (Casino Theme)
3. Crazy Carnival (Carnival Theme
4. Where The Deceased Rest (Cemetery Theme)
5. Haunted House (8-Bit)
6. Haunted House (Metal Remix)
7. The Solace of Fortitude (Fortress Theme)
8. Arcade Odyssey (Arcade Theme)
9. The Forest Where No One Survives (Haunted Forest Theme)
10. Final Battle (Final Boss Theme)

Where will the songs be installed? I wanna listen to them!

Upon Purchasing and installing, all the songs will be in Blanco's game folder.

All songs are in a .wav format for the best quality.
705200.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
